commit message:
Initial commit.

This version have the least needed features and works.
Clearing the text on Pause, to protect privacy.
Version increased to 1.2
Version removed from gradle file, so the one in the Manifest will be used.
Now a lock will appear before the main window.
Settings added. The encryption key and passcode are no-longer hard-coded.
Now Settings will show previously saved settings.

Now it generates a random IV and put it in the message.

Instead of a hard-coded IV, which is unsecure.
Version updated to 3.1

Now it encrypts the settings using the Passcode.

The structure of the project improved.
Handling exception of settings decryption moved to the Settings Manager itself.
Layout of Settings Activity revised.
Icon changed from default one.
Basic unit tests are implemented.

Better layout for MainActivity. Now it can accept large texts.

Version increased to 3.2
About dialog added to the menu of MainActivity.
There wasn't any need to call `create' before 'show' on Dialog Builder.
Readme file added.
Copyright section added to the Readme.

Copyright notice completed.

1. Copyright notice added at the beginning of each source file.
2. Copyright section of README updated.
3. GPLv3 license added to the repository as a text file.
